summary: Completed frontend testing of Purchases page filter functionality. All core requirements verified: debounce behavior on Customer ID field (500ms), Apply Filters and Clear buttons working, dropdown filters don't auto-apply, Enter key functionality working.

design_issues.issue: Short session timeout causing frequent re-login during testing

passed_tests: Purchases page loads correctly with filter section
Apply Filters and Clear buttons present and functional
Customer ID field has 500ms debounce (no immediate API calls on keystroke)
Clear button resets all filter fields correctly
Enter key in Customer ID field triggers immediate filter application
Dropdown filters (Vendor, Status, Vendor Type) don't auto-apply on selection
Apply Filters button applies pending filter selections
